Spring Securityë¥¼ ì‚¬ìš©í•˜ì—¬ êµ¬í˜„í•˜ê³ ìˆì—ˆë‹¤.. ë§ë¡œë§Œ ë“¤ì–´ë³´ê³ ê±´ë“œë ¤ ë³¸ ì ì´ ì—†ëŠ” ì˜ì—­ì¸ë° ì´ë²ˆ ê¸°íšŒì— í•œë²ˆ ì•Œì•„ë³´ì!! ğŸ˜ğŸ˜ Spring Security Spring Securityë€? Spring Security is a powerful and highly customizable authentication and access-control framework. It is the de-facto standard for securing Spring-based applications. Spring Security is a framework that focuses on providing both authentication and authorization to Java applications.
